messages.content:
Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Below is a message in rot-13. Provide the original text that this encoded message was created from.
Rot-13 text: "Qvfphffvbaf nyfb eribyirq nebhaq frphevgl, raretl, naq rpbabzvp qrirybczrag sbe gur orarsvg bs pvgvmraf."
Original text:
Discussions also revolved around security, energy, and economic development for the benefit of citizens.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Below is a message in rot-13. Provide the original text that this encoded message was created from.
Rot-13 text: "Gung'f bhe jnl bs guvaxvat naq jung jr onfr bhe jbex ba."
Original text:
That's our way of thinking and what we base our work on.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Below is a message in rot-13. Provide the original text that this encoded message was created from.
Rot-13 text: "Fbba nsgre, ur ohvyg npnqrzvp naq yvgrenel pnerref."
Original text:
Soon after, he built academic and literary careers.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Below is a message in rot-13. Provide the original text that this encoded message was created from.
Rot-13 text: "Ab ybatre whfg n tragyrzna’f nterrzrag, gur pb-znantrzrag senzrjbex vf n inyvqngvba bs gur jbex bs fgnxrubyqref obgu jvguva naq orlbaq gur obhaqnevrf bs cnexf."
Original text:
No longer just a gentleman’s agreement, the co-management framework is a validation of the work of stakeholders both within and beyond the boundaries of parks.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Below is a message in rot-13. Provide the original text that this encoded message was created from.
Rot-13 text: "Va 2022, gur gbgny genqr gheabire ernpurq n uvfgbevp uvtu bs HFQ 12.33 ovyyvba."
Original text:
In 2022, the total trade turnover reached a historic high of USD 12.33 billion.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Below is a message in rot-13. Provide the original text that this encoded message was created from.
Rot-13 text: "Zhpu nf vg qbrf gbqnl, Vaqvn pbafvfgrq bs znal eryvtvbaf, rguavpvgvrf naq ynathntrf."
Original text:
Much as it does today, India consisted of many religions, ethnicities and languages.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Below is a message in rot-13. Provide the original text that this encoded message was created from.
Rot-13 text: "Zl trarengvba bs cebqhpref naq V ner abj guvaxvat bs ubj gb znxr gur svyz cenpgvpr fhfgnvanoyr."
Original text:
My generation of producers and I are now thinking of how to make the film practice sustainable.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Below is a message in rot-13. Provide the original text that this encoded message was created from.
Rot-13 text: "Pbzzhavpngvba naq vasbezngvba funevat orgjrra crbcyr, gur tbireazrag, naq fbpvrgl unir orra fvtavsvpnagyl vzcnpgrq ol NV naq qngn bcgvzvfngvba grpuabybtvrf va cbyvgvpf."
Original text:
Communication and information sharing between people, the government, and society have been significantly impacted by AI and data optimisation technologies in politics.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Below is a message in rot-13. Provide the original text that this encoded message was created from.
Rot-13 text: "Jura jr ena sbe bssvpr, jr unq ab cebtenz naq cenpgvpnyyl qvq abg xabj jung pbhyq or qbar."
Original text:
When we ran for office, we had no program and practically did not know what could be done.

Rot-13 text: "N jbzna va n ivoenag urnqfpnes fvatf nf fur znepurf jvgu gur cebprffvba."
Original text:
A woman in a vibrant headscarf sings as she marches with the procession.
